title: Nanocellulose reinforced polyvinyl alcohol-based bio-nanocomposite films: improved mechanical, UV-light barrier, and thermal properties
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23232-23239
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04205K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Melbi Mahardika, Nanang Masruchin, Devita Amelia, Rushdan Ahmad Ilyas, Athanasia Amanda Septevani, Edi Syafri, Novitri Hastuti, Myrtha Karina, Moonis Ali Khan, Byong-Hun Jeon, Nasmi Herlina Sari
This study reported the development and characterisation of bio-nanocomposite films based on the polyvinyl alcohol (PVA) reinforced with cellulose nanofibres (CNFs) of different concentrations (1–5 wt%), isolated from pineapple leaf fibre.
